attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the British public, are tired of our history, culture and national identity being taken away from us.  The removal of Britannia from our coins will be another nail in the coffin unless this plan is firmly dropped.

rejection.details: There is already a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/50pence/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
